tool_description: An API showing all the latest Covid News from around the world.
name: Covid News Live
title: Covid News Live

api_list.name: Get COVID News from a specific news source
api_list.description: Get all COVID News from a specific news resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://covid-news-live1.p.rapidapi.com/news/thetimesofindia"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid-news-live1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://covid-news-live1.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid-news-live1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All COVID News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about COVID 19 from all over the world.
